name: imminently
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is likely to happen very soon: Venice is imminently threatened with flooding. Their sixth child is due imminently. See
imminent
More examplesFewer examplesI was still waiting for my new printer, which was to have been delivered imminently. New initiatives will be announced by the government imminently, according to reports.I was certain that I would see her imminently.
